DIA_13316_FakeJorn_AfterQ205_03_03: We found him wandering in the company of other refugees.
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_AfterQ205_03_04: He fit your description, so we brought him in.
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_AfterQ205_03_05: Are you speechless with joy, brother?
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_15_03: I could recognize my own brother.
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_15_04: This is some kind of crook!
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_03_06: Can you explain why you lied to us?
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_03_07: Well, gentlemen... The whole lost brother story really grabbed me!
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_03_08: When you asked me about it, I thought maybe my appearance would cause a big smile!
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_15_10: Your lie was stupid and insolent! Do you even have any idea where my real brother is?
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_03_12: Oh, shit. Sorry about that mistake, Marvin!
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_HeIsImpostor_03_13: Go get some rest, and we'll have another talk with this little bugger!
DIA_13316_FakeJorn_IAmSorry_03_01: Sorry, I think I've messed up enough...
